verses.1: Tu-in Nebatʼ tapa Kumpi Jeroboamʼ kum sawm le kum giatna kumin Abijam in Judah tungah uk ding kipan hi.
verses.2: Amah in Jerusalem ah kum thum sung uk hi. Ama nuʼ min Maakah hi a, Absalomʼ tanu ahi hi.
verses.3: Ama mai-a a paʼ khialhna khempeuh amah in zui hi. A pusawn David a thuman bangin Topa a Pasianʼ tungah a lungsim thuman bup lo hi.
verses.4: Ahi zongin Davidʼ hangin Topa a Pasian in Jerusalem ah amah tapa khat pia a, ama khit ah a tapa koihin Jerusalem kipsak hi.
verses.5: Bang hang hiam cih leh Hit mi Uriah thu ah cih sim loh ama nuntak sung tawntung Topaʼ mitah David a manin gamta-in a thupiakte khat peuhpeuh panin amah pial lo hi.
verses.6: Tu-in Abijamʼ nuntak sung tawntung amah le Jeroboamʼ kikalah kidona om hi.
verses.7: Abijamʼ gamtatna a omlaite le a sep khempeuh, Judah Kumpiteʼ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Tua ciangin Abijam le Jeroboam kikalah gal kidona om hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin Abijam si a, amaute in David khuapi sungah amah vui uh hi. Ama tangin a tapa Asa in uk hi.
verses.9: Israel kumpi Jeroboamʼ kum sawm nihna kumin Asa in Judah tungah uk ding kipan a,
verses.10: amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawm li le khat sung uk hi. Ama piʼ min Maakah hi a, Absalomʼ tanu ahi hi.
verses.11: Ama pupi David a gamtat bangin Topaʼ muhna ah Asa a manin gamta hi.
verses.12: Amah in gam sung panin pasal paktat pawlte koih khia-in a pateʼ bawl sa milim khempeuh khiin khia hi.
verses.13: Amah in Asherah milim dingin a kibawl a kihhuai milim khat nei ahih manin kumpinuʼ nu hihna panin a pi Maakah zong khiin khia hi. Tua hi a, Asa in tua nuʼ milim phukin Kidron lui ah a hal hi.
verses.14: Ahih hangin mual tunga biaknate kila khia lo hi. Ahi zongin ama hunsung khempeuh Asaʼ lungsim Topaʼ tungah thuman bup hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin amah in a paʼ ap sa letsongte le ama ap sa letsongte, ngun, kham le nazatte Topaʼ biakinn sungah a paipih hi.
verses.16: Amauʼ hunsung tawntung Asa le Israel kumpi Baasha kikalah gal kidona om hi.
verses.17: Judah a sim dingin Israel kumpi Baasha kuan to a, Judah kumpi Asa kiang pan kuamah paikhia thei lo, kuamah a tum theih loh nadingin Ramah khua a lam hi.
verses.18: Tua ciangin Asa in Topaʼ biakinn sung vankoihna le kumpipa inn vankoihna sungah a om lai ngun le kham khempeuh la-in ama nasemteʼ khut sungah tuate a pia hi. Tua ciangin kumpi Asa in Damaskas ah a teeng, Syria kumpi, Hezionʼ tapa Tabrimmon, a tapa Benhadad kiangah tuate puak a,
verses.19: “Ka pa le na pa mah bangin kei le nang kikalah kipawlna khat omsak ni. Ngun le kham letsong nangma tungah kong puak hi. Keima kiang panin amah a nungkik theih nadingin Israel kumpi Baasha tawh na kipawlna va su tat in,” a ci hi.
verses.20: Tua ciangin Benhadad in Kumpi Asaʼ thu mang a, Israel khuapite a sim dingin a galkap a ukte sawlin, Ijon, Dan, Abelbeth-maakah le Khinneroth khempeuh, Naftali gam khempeuh tawh a zo hi.
verses.21: Baasha in tua thu a zak ciangin Ramah a lam khawlin Tirzah ah om hi.
verses.22: Tua ciangin kumpi Asa in Judah gam khempeuh ah thu genzakna khat bawl a, kuamah peng loin a milipin Baasha in khua lamna-a a zat Ramah suangte le a singte a pua khia dingin a sawl hi. Tua ciangin kumpi Asa in tuate tawh Benjamin miteʼ khua Geba le Mizpah khua a lam hi.
verses.23: Tu-in Asaʼ gamtatna a omlaite khempeuh, ama thahatna khempeuh, ama sep khempeuh le ama lam khuapite, Judah Kumpiteʼ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Ahih hangin a teek ciangin a khete ah natna khat a nei hi.
verses.24: Tua ciangin Asa si a, a pupi David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jehoshafat in a uk hi.
verses.25: Judah kumpi Asaʼ kum nihna kumin Jeroboamʼ tapa Nadab in Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in Israel tungah kum nih sung uk hi.
verses.26: Topaʼ muhna ah amah a sia gamta a, a paʼ khekhap mah tawnin, Israel a khialhsakna ama khialhna mah a zui hi.
verses.27: Issakhar minam Ahijahʼ tapa Baasha in Nadab sawm sim hi. Baasha in Filistia-teʼ khua Gibbethon ah amah sat tuk hi. Nadab le Israel khempeuh in Gibbethon umcihin a om laitakun a thah ahi hi.
verses.28: Tua ahih ciangin Judah kumpi Asaʼ kum thumna kumin Baasha in Nadab that a, Nadab tangin amah in a uk hi.
verses.29: Amah kumpi ahih phetin Jeroboamʼ innkuan khempeuh that hi. Topa in Shiloh khuami a nasem pa Ahijah tungtawnin a gen sa bangin a vekpi-in a suksiat khit dongin mi khat zong Jeroboamʼ innkuan ah nusia lo hi.
verses.30: Tua pen ama khialhna le Israel a khialhsakna ahi Jeroboamʼ khialhnate hang le Israel Pasian, Topa a hehsakna hang ahi hi.
verses.31: Tu-in Nadabʼ gamtatna a omlaite le a sep khempeuh, Israel Kumpiteʼ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
verses.32: Amauʼ hunsung khempeuh Asa le Israel kumpi Baasha kikalah gal kidona a om hi.
verses.33: Judah kumpi Asaʼ kum thumna kumin Ahijahʼ tapa Baasha in Israel khempeuh tungah Tirzah panin uk ding kipan a, kum sawm nih le li sung a uk hi.
verses.34: Topaʼ muhna ah amah a sia gamta a, Jeroboamʼ khekhap mah tawnin, Israel a khialhsakna ama khialhna mah a zui hi.
